page.title: 17Hypermarket
page.content: Until 1983 the shopping facilities in this block have been of the small corner shop or small local arcade variety.Recently a huge hypermarket has been built on the site of the Solent Motel.Many local traders are complaning that they have lost trade to Tesco store.Some shops have closed and others taken over by the small asian community as food stores or take away restaraunts. There is a{petrol station on the site now so that the local garages are losing business.The hypermarket sells a great variety of things,groceries, wines,d.i.y,clothes,shoes,car servicing parts,vegetables,electrical, etc.The checkouts are very automated the prices are scanned with a laser beam and are shown on a screen and on the bill for checking.
